extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Product and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Determine if the installed version of Adobe Acrobat or Acrobat Reader is affected by checking the product version against the affected versions list.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Adobe Software
extracted_playbook.description: Update Adobe Acrobat or Acrobat Reader to the latest version as recommended in the Security Bulletin.

cve_id: Adobe Acrobat and Reader Security Update
affected_products: Acrobat Reader DC Continuous: 23.003.20284 and earlier
Acrobat 2020 Classic 2020: 20.005.30516 (Mac) and earlier/ 20.005.30514 (Win) and earlier
Acrobat Reader 2020 Classic 2020: 20.005.30516 (Mac) and earlier/ 20.005.30514 (Win) and earlier
